about.title: About AgroGPT
about.description: AgroGPT is your AI-powered farming assistant designed to help farmers, researchers, and agronomists make informed agricultural decisions. It combines computer vision and natural language processing to detect plant diseases, suggest treatments, and summarize field insights intelligently.

reports.title: Reports
reports.description: Your generated crop reports and history will appear here.
